mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (tableId, cafeId, userId, reserveStart, reserveEnd, personCnt, status, reserveDate, createDate) VALUES (#{tableId}, #{cafeId}, #{userId}, #{reserveStart}, #{reserveEnd}, #{personCnt}, #{status}, #{reserveDate}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reserveDate = #{reserveDate} AND tableId = #{tableId} AND status IN ('A','P','F')
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reserveDate = #{date} AND cafeId = #{cafeId} AND status IN ('A','P','F') ORDER BY userId, tableId, reserveStart
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE cafeId = #{cafeId} AND status = 'A' ORDER BY reserveDate, userId, tableId, reserveStart
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE cafeId = #{cafeId} AND status = 'P' ORDER BY reserveDate, userId, tableId, reserveStart
select * from reservation where userId = #{userId} and status in ('N','F') order by createDate DESC
select * from reservation where userId = #{userId} and status in ('A','P') order by createDate DESC
